acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable Pojos with non generic collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosWithNonGenericCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly 5 elements
Then the Set<?> [java.lang.Object@6ffa56fa, java.lang.Object@6c575325, java.lang.Object@736309a9, java.lang.Object@4e93dcb9, java.lang.Object@747d1932] should contain at least one non-empty element
Then the collection should have exactly 5 elements

Then the Map<?, ?> {java.lang.Object@59c33386=java.lang.Object@6240651f, java.lang.Object@719d35e8=java.lang.Object@3cf7298d, java.lang.Object@2f651f93=java.lang.Object@1ff55ff, java.lang.Object@5cb042da=java.lang.Object@351f2244, java.lang.Object@571a9686=java.lang.Object@5496c165} should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly 5 elements
